title: Ep 147 | The Religion of BLM, Social Justice Jesus, and 'Cuties' | Guests: 'Just Thinking' Co-hosts
description:
"Just Thinking Podcast" co-hosts Darrell B. Harrison and Virgil "Omaha" Walker join Phil, Jase, and Al to discuss the church of Black Lives Matter, onerous government mandates for churches, liberals turning to Jesus, spiritual poverty, the fabrication of "Social Justice Jesus," why dads matter, and one problem with Netflix's "Cuties" that's not getting enough attention.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
